Your private e * d mod phi(n) = 1

Therefore (e * d) - 1 === phi (is some multiple of phi)

Therefore phi = (e * d - 1) / ceil((e * d - 1) / n)

Agent 7's private decrypting exponent is

d7 = lift(Mod(1/e7, phi))

